verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H1732"\w* end, \w a|strong="H1732"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* himself.

Blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* understandeth \w concerning|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* needy \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* poor: \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* deliver \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* evil day.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* Lord preserve \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w give|strong="H5927"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* life, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w make|strong="H3559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* blessed \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H5927"\w*: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* deliver \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3559"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7272"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6965"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* help \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* bed \w of|strong="H0430"\w* sorrow: thou hast \w turned|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H6310"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* couch \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* sickness.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w*: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w be|strong="H3808"\w* thou merciful \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: heal \w my|strong="H7760"\w* soul, \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* sinned \w against|strong="H0413"\w* thee.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* enemies \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* evils \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* die \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* name perish?

\w And|strong="H2077"\w* if \w he|strong="H3808"\w* came \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0241"\w* see \w me|strong="H7592"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* spoke vain \w things|strong="H0241"\w*: \w his|strong="H3808"\w* heart gathered together iniquity \w to|strong="H0241"\w* itself. \w He|strong="H3808"\w* went out \w and|strong="H2077"\w* spoke \w to|strong="H0241"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* same purpose.

\w All|strong="H2009"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* enemies whispered \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* devised evils \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.
\w They|strong="H7522"\w* determined against me \w an|strong="H0430"\w* unjust word: \w shall|strong="H8451"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H0430"\w* sleepeth rise again no more?

\w For|strong="H3045"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* man \w of|strong="H3068"\w* peace, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* whom \w I|strong="H2009"\w* trusted, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* ate \w my|strong="H3068"\w* bread, hath greatly supplanted \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* thou, O \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w*, \w have|strong="H3808"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* raise \w me|strong="H3808"\w* up again: \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* requite \w them|strong="H8432"\w*.

\w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* know, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* thou hast \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* good \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*: \w because|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemy \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* rejoice \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast upheld \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w reason|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* innocence: \w and|strong="H7218"\w* hast \w established|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy sight \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever.

Blessed \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel \w from|strong="H3068"\w* eternity \w to|strong="H3068"\w* eternity. So \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w*. So \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w*.
